channel.title: Post-rsses on Xliiauo
channel.description: Recent content in Post-rsses on Xliiauo

item.title: Avoid padding top in Outlook
item.description:
As I have been organising the team’s Brown Bag events since last year, we send out an html email every week to let the team know what’s happening. The html email have never been easy to keep a consistent style across all platforms.

The macOS Outlook and the built in Mail has always been very friendly towards html emails. Problems

item.title: Hello world
item.description:
After having tried out several static site engines and hosting solutions. I’ve finally started writing my first blog. Yeah!

What to write about? I guess everything about my life maybe food or travel? I would probably write a little about technologies although I am really not a guru. I enjoy exploring new technologies and I can spend my whole weekend in my uni library, play with some cool stuff, say, Elasticsearch stack.

Having been in the UK for 2 years and really enjoying living and working here. I found the food is really not too bad. Three of my favourites: sausage rolls, Yorkshire puddings and victoria sponge cakes.

Alright, guess that is so much for today.

Until next time,

Xiao
